nodes.text: Quillan was a Moff on the Council of Moffs in 19 ABY. He was one of the most vehement opponents of Pellaeon's suggestion for negotiated peace with the New Republic, going so far as to say that Pellaeon had no business running the military.
In 44 ABY, he was one of Admiral Natasi Daala's most ardent public supporter in the Imperial Remnant's general election.
